metadata.title: CVE-2024-20380 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in the HTML parser of ClamAV could allow anunauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS)condition on an affected device.The vulnerability is due to an issue in the C to Rust foreign functioninterface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by submitting acrafted file containing HTML content to be scanned by ClamAV on an affecteddevice. An exploit could allow the attacker to cause the ClamAV scanningprocess to terminate, resulting in a DoS condition on the affectedsoftware.

criterions.comment: clamav package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
